channel.title: Ai-Platform on lust.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Ai-Platform on lust.dev

item.title: gcloud SDK 260.0.0 Release Analysis
item.description:
Google Cloud SDK version 260.0.0 introduces breaking changes requiring the --region flag for Cloud Dataproc and altering Cloud Run authentication. Significant new features include Shielded GKE Nodes for enhanced security, expanded BigQuery IAM policy management, and a new Policy Troubleshooter for IAM permissions.

item.title: gcloud SDK 254.0.0 Release Analysis
item.description:
Google Cloud SDK 254.0.0 introduces significant advancements across several services. AI Platform and Compute Engine saw major flags and resource policies promoted to General Availability, enhancing training job configuration and disk management. Cloud Pub/Sub gained beta support for controlling message storage regions, alongside important bug fixes for Firestore Emulator, Cloud Run, and Cloud Storage to improve stability and user experience.

Jump to: Annotated Release Notes | Stats ðŸ“Š

item.title: gcloud SDK 243.0.0 Release Analysis
item.description:
Google Cloud SDK 243.0.0 introduces several breaking changes, including the deprecation of gcloud ml-engine in favor of gcloud ai-platform and flag renames for AI Platform and Compute Engine. Key new features include extensive GA promotions for Compute Engine flags and command groups, new IP alias support for Cloud Composer, and Cloud Run add-on management for Kubernetes Engine. Minor security updates and command restructuring for Cloud Tasks were also implemented.
